testcase.title: To verify Alert on Jpharm Data Creation

steps.title: I perform Quick Search by "Cancer"

substeps.message: User is navigated to Clinical Trials report type

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Clinical Trials" on page 'Results'
I click on 1 report link from the results table

substeps.message: Specific report with report id321008 opened

steps.title: I navigate to report with ID "321008"

substeps.message: Value containsMix Vaccine for Metastatic Colorectal Cancer

steps.title: I check whether the value in row "Title" has "Mix Vaccine for Metastatic Colorectal Cancer" in report page snapshot tab
I click on Alert link on report page
I click on button 'Alert on Report' on pop-up 'CREATE ALERT'
I change the alert name to "Verify_CT__Text_Weekly_WithUpdate" in text box 'Name'on step 'Save Search and Alert' on pop-up 'Search and Alerts'
I click on button 'Next'
Label 'Alert updates' is displayed on `Save Search and/or alert`
I select checkbox 'Alert me if there are no updates' on step 'REASON FOR UPDATE' on pop-up 'Search and Alerts'
I click on button 'Next'
I select radiobutton "HTML" on 'Email format' section on step 'FORMAT, START DATE AND FREQUENCY'
I select radiobutton "Specify date" on 'Start date of alert' section on step 'FORMAT, START DATE AND FREQUENCY'
I select "Daily" option from dropdown 'Frequency' on step 'FORMAT, START DATE AND FREQUENCY'
I click on button 'Create'

substeps.message: 'Save and Alert' confirmation message is displayed

steps.title: Confirmation message 'Save and Alert' is displayed
I click On "Searches and alerts" link under "Profile Menu" options on new Home Page

substeps.message: Text of SET ELEMENT NAME is Edit name Verify_CT__Text_Weekly_WithUpdate_01-4-2019 04:53:59.

Alert name isVerify_CT__Text_Weekly_WithUpdate_01-4-2019 04:53:59and actual name displayed in Name column in row 1 on page My Searches and Alerts and Actual text is Edit name Verify_CT__Text_Weekly_WithUpdate_01-4-2019 04:53:59

steps.title: Table 'Saved Reports' contains alert name in row 1 on column "Name" on page 'My Searches and Alerts'
